artist: Artist: Attributed to Santo Niño Santero
creditline: Gift of Margaret V. B. Wurtele
description: standing female figure with her head tilted toward PR, hands folded; wearing a long dark blue headscarf and a red robe, with a red pear-shaped cut gem on her breastbone; three white lines of tears on each cheek; linear designs of three long leaves at front corners of base
title: Nuestra Señora de Dolores
